oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Long baseline neutrino experiments
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SANKAR, SU
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: neutrino oscillations
long baseline
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this talk I review the physics that can be done at accelerator-based long baseline neutrino experiments, both current and future (those under construction and those that are proposed).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: DAE-BRNS 8th Workshop in High Energy Physics Phenomenology,Mumbai, INDIA,JAN 05-16, 2004
